title: Quarkus Upstream / Mutiny `collectItems()` has been removed
body:
### Describe the bug

As a result of [this commit](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/commit/8243740c44f8bf8fc11c47c33bab8d679ed8f906) mutiny `collectItems()` has been removed. There are other breaking changes as you can see on [this Doc](https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-mutiny/releases)

Please don't forget to attach all of this breaking changes to the future release note

### Expected behavior

_No response_

_No response_
